alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Barnwell; Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 5:43PM EDT until April 05 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Barnwell County in central South Carolina... Aiken County in central South Carolina... Western Orangeburg County in central South Carolina... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 543 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Ellenton, or 7 miles southwest of Aiken Mall, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Aiken, North Augusta, Savannah River Site, Aiken Mall, Clearwater, Williston, New Ellenton, Jackson, Citizens Park, Gloverville, Aiken State Park, Burnettown, Wagener, Perry, Elko, Windsor, Savannah River Site Badge Office, Aiken Gopher Tortoise Heritage Preserve, Perry Airport and Audubon`s Silver Bluff Sanctuary. This includes the following highways... Interstate 520 in Georgia near mile marker 15. Interstate 520 in South Carolina between mile markers 16 and 17. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for east central Georgia...and central South Carolina. For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for east central Georgia...and central South Carolina.
